dapps.name: Genkicell
dapps.details: Genkicell DAPP is a one health management and service platform software that will link health organizations and individual users. It is based on decentralized universal digital identity, helping individual users to manage their own health status, while accurately assisting users to find a health service organization that suits them. It can also help healthy companies achieve data interaction and form an industry cooperation alliance.

dapps.name: Spokkz
dapps.details: Spokkz will use Blockchain Technology to disrupt the $2 Trillion USD traditional Media Industry by creating a decentralized ecosystem and marketplace where film lovers will join advertisers, stars, content creators and merchants as stakeholders.

dapps.name: HyperDragons Go!
dapps.details: The renowned Idle RPG game is starting an amazing blockchain game journey with you

dapps.name: LuckyNumber
dapps.details: LuckyNumber is a decentralized, trusted blockchain game running on the Ontology public chain. The lottery, the prize, and the allocation of funds are done by smart contracts. No one can predict or tamper with the results, making the game fair and credible.

dapps.name: 有叻积分资产通兑平台
dapps.details: 复星“有叻”-致力于为全球家庭客户智造极致的消费体验，实现家庭积分打通、家庭权益整合和家庭消费定制。

dapps.name: AHDS
dapps.details: AHDS is a decentralized healthcare data economy. It provied a self-evolving data market in which users will get hold of their health data and share them with service providers under fully authorization and gain profits

dapps.name: CryptoMeetup
dapps.details: CryptoMeetup是一个完全运行在区块链上的、基于前沿技术构建的全球区块链活动平台，用户可以在3D的虚拟地球上发布区块链活动，也可以买卖土地资产来竞选土地管理员。我们希望能够将区块链游戏和区块链活动相结合，创作出更加可持续性发展的游戏模式

dapps.name: CollectPumpkin
dapps.details: The Collect Pumpkin smart contract is a sample of OEP-8 smart contract. OEP-8 smart contract allows you to transfer different amount of tokens for different crypto items from one address to another address or do batch transfer. It combines the advantages of fungible OEP-4 tokens and non-fungible OEP-5 tokens, satisfying the intense requirement from many different scenarios, especially blockchain games.

dapps.name: Lucky
dapps.desc: LUCKY token is used for Lucky series games

dapps.name: Wontology
dapps.details: This is an dice game, the dice point will be abstract from the hash number on the ontology blockchain. Player will ask to select the amount and the number of guessing, an winning occur if the hash number is below the guessing number

dapps.name: Xhance
dapps.details: Xhance is the first DApp of Adrealm. It is the first decentralized digital advertising data analysis platform.

dapps.name: Deershooter
dapps.desc: The more you play, the more you get
dapps.details: All transactions will be implement through smart contract and record on ontology blockchain network. Irreversible processs meaning manipulation is forbidden in any scenarios. A reward will be given to player according to their score, from 0 to 5000.

dapps.name: LuckyMoon
dapps.details: Luckymoon is a fun game running on Ontology Public Network. The game had designed with a simple rule that testing the reaction of players. Believe or not will decide the amount of winning. If you 'stop' before the line crashes then you will win. If you don't stop before the line crashes then you will lose.

dapps.name: ontology player
dapps.details: The integration of blockchain improve the fairness and transparency of the games. Player will not only enjoy joyness of winning, also the scales of justice.
